full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): NO TITLE [@001B NA MO GU RU MANYDZU GHO shA YA, GANG GI RING LUGS GTZUG LAG SPOR THANG RTZIS, ,PHRA ZHIB SKAR 'GO'I DBYI BA MA LUS PA, ,YID BZHIN 'BYED DBANG RGYA BOD SOGS MKHAS MCHOG ,BYON ZER BZHUGS DANG 'BYON 'GYUR RNAMS LA DANG,]
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI GZHIN RTZIS KYI GZHUNG @011B LAS BSHAD TSOD LTAR BCOS RIM SOGS MI GRUB PA DBUL ZHING DMAN PA'I GSHIN GSON 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN PA'I LHAG BSAM GYIS KUN NASS BSLANGS TE, ,RTZIS GZHUNG DANG BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI MAN NGAG LA BRTEN NAS, ^ SKYABS MGON RJE BTZUN DAM PA'I BKA' 'BANGS RIG 'DZIN DPAL MGON BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE MING CAN GYIS SOO MYA ZHES PA, SA MO BYA LO DPYID ZLA 'BRING PO' MAR PHYOGS KYI DGA' BA GNYIS PAR AER TE NI JO BO'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG GIS BGYIS PA'O, ,LEGS SO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
